cast.original_title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
cast.overview: When the bumbling Lieutenant Frank Drebin investigates events following the shooting of his partner, he stumbles upon an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.
cast.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!

cast.overview: Popular and dashing American singer Nick Rivers travels to East Germany to perform in a music festival. When he loses his heart to the gorgeous Hillary Flammond, he finds himself caught up in an underground resistance movement. Rivers joins forces with Agent Cedric and Flammond to attempt the rescue of her father, Dr. Paul, from the Germans, who have captured the scientist in hopes of coercing him into building a new naval mine.
cast.title: Top Secret!

details.biography: Burton Charles Zucker was a "small-part" character actor who appeared in several comedy spoofs made by his sons Jerry Zucker and David Zucker.
details.name: Burton Zucker
